Name: English Breakfast Cocktail
Ingredients: 2 drop Saline solution 4:1 (20g sea salt to 80g water) optional
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of orange zest twist.
EXPRESS orange zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: Gin's botanicals and rich floral elderflower are the foundation overlayed with zesty sour citrus freshness and drying black tea tannins.
History: Created in 2006 by yours truly, London, England.
Nutrition: One serving of English Breakfast Cocktail contains 142 calories
